entry.title: Population tweaks
entry.summary: Reduced pop spikes on mass drop-ins and improved anti-air feel.
entry.markdown:
### Arsenal balance - Anti-air tracking is smoother with clearer hit feedback. - Mass drop-ins now respect per-wave population caps.
![AA pass](https://www.toledoblade.com/image/2009/03/07/600x_q90_a4-3_cTCjpg/Halo-Wars-comes-up-short-in-popular-series.jpg)
